text: Motion

Ah...
Welcome back, Producer-san!
Ah, I'm back, Chiyuki.

Hehe, please wait a moment.
Once I hang this up...
I'll go make some tea.
...Huh? What are you hanging up?

The sunlight is strong today,
even through the window.
It might be better to move it a bit further inside.
I'll take care of it later.
It's almost done, so it's fine.
Look, Producer-san, look!
Wow...

It's a beautiful flower decoration.
And it's really intricate...

Hehe, I'm flattered
...I'm glad you like it.

Oh,
did you make this, Chiyuki?

Yes, I did.
I had some time last night, so...

I sewed together some scraps
and made seasonal flowers.
I see...

If that's the case, how about hanging it on
top of the TV instead of the window?

Since it has such beautiful colors,
it might fade in the sunlight if left there.

No,
it's fine here.

Here, when you come back and open the door,
it'll catch your eye, right?

Certainly.
The colors are eye-catching.

Hehe,
it makes you feel like saying "I'm home", doesn't it?
It feels like being warmly welcomed.
Thank you.
...I'd be happy if everyone felt the same way.
I'm sure they will.

Chiyuki probably made this flower decoration to
create a warm atmosphere for everyone, right?
It's kind of embarrassing, but...
Yes, that's right...

"When you open the door, it's like, "Let's give it our all
today!" or  "I'm tired, I want something to drink!"
Don't you feel like there's a sense of switching gears?

Wouldn't it be nice if seeing the beautiful
colors lifted your mood a bit?
I see...

Yes,
and also...

Aren't flowers the most beautiful
when they're in the sunlight?
So, leaving it by the window—
Right?
